name: Spooky Tropics Resort
description:
=== Controls ===

W,D: movement

Mouse: aim

Left click: shoot (shooting propels you in the opposite direction)

F, Space: interact with ghosts

Esc: go back to main menu / leave the game from main menu

=== Challenges ===

Selfmade asseter

Beatboxer: All sound effects are made from voice and mouth noises. They were transformed using a granular synthesizer, sound effects and a sampler.

Representation master: Wheelchair-bound main character

Watches steve irwin once: Main character is a (anthropomorphic) rabbit, and we have a Bat enemy

Notice me sempai: The goal of the game is to accompany ghosts that boooo at you to their rooms

We love you too: One of the enemies is a pacman that eats and star and explode when detecting the player near

Gotta love nostalgia 

The egg came first: The fuzzbal enemy is really similar to the Fuzzy from the Mario series

Outside the box: No jumping, instead the player gets propelled in the opposite direction of where they shoot

Nothing is the same: Enemies are randomly generated and the layout of the rooms gets shuffled at a set interval

=== Credits ===

- Salah 'MistaLounge' Wari : Game Design, Programming

- Maksim Sen:  Art

- Vincent 'Ambrosis' Gagnon: Music and Sounds

- Naomi Catwell: Programming

We collaborated on a lot of aspects <3

=== Extra Credits ===

- Nour Wari

- Myiah Catwell
